EmailTemplate.name: School Hours
EmailTemplate.subject: Update on Student Handbook
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Parents
I hope that you have received the parent student handbook yesterday. If you are still to arrive back in Moscow we will ensure that you receive one on arrival back at ISM.
I trust that you found it informative. Also remember that you will receive Curriculum letters and important dates for the term on Monday and have the opportunity to "Meet the Teacher" in the week beginning September 5th. (More details to follow next week) I did want to identify one page (page 4) that unfortunately suffered from some unintended re-formatting at the printing stage. You will be relieved to know that the children do not have a one hour morning break on Lower Campus!
Please see attached the information for school hours attached.
Best regards Paul
Paul Seedhouse Headteacher The International School of Moscow Tel: Â +7 (499) 922 44 00 Fax: +7 (499) 922 44 00 Ext.4 www.internationalschool.ru Part of The British Schools Group
*Disclaimer:* This message (including any attachments) contains confidential information intended for a specific individual and purpose, and is protected by law. If you are not the intended recipient, you should delete this message and are hereby notified that any disclosure, copying, or distribution of this message, or the taking of any action based on it, is strictly prohibited.
